questions.question: Which district does Sidney Jayarathna represent in the Sri Lankan Parliament?
questions.answer: Sidney Jayarathna represents the Polonnaruwa District in the Sri Lankan Parliament.

questions.question: Which political party is Sidney Jayarathna affiliated with?
questions.answer: Sidney Jayarathna is affiliated with the United National Party.

questions.question: When did Sidney Jayarathna assume office as a Member of Parliament?
questions.answer: Sidney Jayarathna assumed office as a Member of Parliament in 2015.

questions.question: What significant election event is associated with Sidney Jayarathna in 2015?
questions.answer: Sidney Jayarathna was elected to the Sri Lankan Parliament from the Polonnaruwa District in the 2015 general elections.

questions.question: Which Parliament session is Sidney Jayarathna a member of?
questions.answer: Sidney Jayarathna is a member of the 15th Parliament of Sri Lanka (2015â€“2020).

questions.question: What information is given about Sidney Jayarathna's political career in the provided references?
questions.answer: The references provide information about Sidney Jayarathna's election results and his affiliation with the United National Party.
